REPORT.name: Процессы
REPORT.description: Отчет отображает статистику по запускаемым процессам --- Author: NodaSoft support@nodasoft.ru
REPORT.code:
select [Name] as [Процесс], CAST (Sum(CAST (StopTime as decimal(10,5)) - CAST (StartTime as decimal(10,5)))*24 as decimal (10,2)) as [Длит.(час)] from Process where (not [StartTime] is null and not [StartTime] is null and ([StartTime] >= %TIME-START%) and ([StartTime]<=%TIME-STOP%)) and ([Name] <> 'userinit.exe') and ([Name] <> 'winlogon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'wuauclt.exe') and ([Name] <> 'services.exe') and ([Name] <> 'smss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'spoolsv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'svchost.exe') and ([Name] <> '[System Process]') and ([Name] <> 'alg.exe') and ([Name] <> 'csrss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'ctfmon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'explorer.exe') and ([Name] <> 'rshell.exe') and ([Name] <> 'logonui.exe') and ([Name] <> 'lsass.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gccl.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gcclsrv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'System')
group by [Name] order by [Длит.(час)] desc
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
